title: Rahu Transit in Sixth House: Strategic Victory, Competitive Edge, and Problem-Solving Power
summary: For Aquarius Ascendant, Rahu transiting the sixth house strengthens competitiveness, problem-solving, and the drive to overcome obstacles. You become sharper in handling conflicts, rivals, and complex work situations. This phase favors analytics, technology, research, and unconventional methods to fix persistent issues. Health routines need discipline, as stress or irregular habits can surface. Legal or dispute matters may turn in your favor with strategy. When effort is focused and ethical, Rahu here delivers decisive wins and practical mastery.
closing: Rahu in the sixth house brings victory when strategy, discipline, and ethics work together.
